TypeSignature.Value: public interface IAlgorithmConstraints : Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable
.class public interface auto ansi abstract IAlgorithmConstraints implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class System.IDisposable
type IAlgorithmConstraints = interface interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: This interface specifies constraints for cryptographic algorithms, keys (key sizes), and other algorithm parameters.

Docs.summary: Determines whether an algorithm is granted permission for the specified cryptographic primitives.
Docs.returns: true if the algorithm is permitted and can be used for all of the specified cryptographic primitives
